name: Clocker Hellion
description: Clocker has Killed you over 3 times... You can't escape this time...Or can you? He doesn't like people like you who beat him. This time he has sent out another beast that may not be that easy to win, His intelligence is too good, He may go back and forth to trick you, Or he may lure you into a room with and jump out at you without even noticing. W A S D  to move Mouse to look F toggle flashlight P pause game
